name: Eater of Blocks
description:
You are a tiny square in a world full other tiny squares trying to eat you. You have to eat the food pellets and other enemies to grow. But try not to get eaten yourself!

Controls and Things:

WASD - Moving around.

W & S - Moving in the menu.

Escape - Returning to the menu.

Note: The game is still under development so more updates are coming soon!
